headline.main: Chudinov Defeats Sturm by Split Decision for WBA Belt
headline.print_headline: Chudinov Defeats Sturm by Split Decision for WBA Belt

docs.snippet: Fedor Chudinov of Russia defeated former middleweight champion Felix Sturm of Germany by split decision for the vacant WBA super middleweight title on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fedor Chudinov of Russia defeated former middleweight champion Felix Sturm of Germany by split decision for the vacant WBA super middleweight title on Saturday.

headline.main: Magnitude-4.5 Earthquake Shakes Big Island of Hawaii
headline.print_headline: Magnitude-4.5 Earthquake Shakes Big Island of Hawaii

docs.snippet: The Hawaiian Volcano Observatory says a magnitude-4.5 earthquake jolted the Big Island of Hawaii....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Hawaiian Volcano Observatory says a magnitude-4.5 earthquake jolted the Big Island of Hawaii.

headline.main: Detroit Airport Terminal Evacuated for 2 Hours, Man Detained
headline.print_headline: Detroit Airport Terminal Evacuated for 2 Hours, Man Detained

docs.snippet: A terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Airport was evacuated for nearly two hours and a man was taken into custody after he made comments to airline employees that raised concerns, an airport spokesman said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Airport was evacuated for nearly two hours and a man was taken into custody after he made comments to airline employees that raised concerns, an airport spokesman said on Saturday.

headline.main: Cameron to Restore Outspoken Ally Gove to Cabinet Front Line
headline.print_headline: Cameron to Restore Outspoken Ally Gove to Cabinet Front Line

docs.snippet: Newly re-elected British Prime Minister David Cameron will  restore one of his most outspoken and combative allies to a leading cabinet role by naming former education minister  Michael Gove as justice secretary....
docs.lead_paragraph: Newly re-elected British Prime Minister David Cameron will  restore one of his most outspoken and combative allies to a leading cabinet role by naming former education minister  Michael Gove as justice secretary.

headline.main: Power-Packed Race Gives Penske 1st Grand Prix Win at Indy
headline.print_headline: Power-Packed Race Gives Penske 1st Grand Prix Win at Indy

docs.snippet: Will Power won the Grand Prix of Indianapolis on Saturday for his first IndyCar victory of the season, leading 65 of 82 laps on the road course at Indianapolis Motor Speedway....
docs.lead_paragraph: Will Power won the Grand Prix of Indianapolis on Saturday for his first IndyCar victory of the season, leading 65 of 82 laps on the road course at Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

headline.main: Ben Carson on God, Country, and His Ailing Mom

docs.snippet: The retired neurosurgeon made his first appearance alongside his Republican rivals since formally entering the Republican presidential field...

headline.main: Real's La Liga Hopes Not Totally Extinguished, Ancelotti Says
headline.print_headline: Real's La Liga Hopes Not Totally Extinguished, Ancelotti Says

docs.snippet: Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti refused to throw in the towel after Saturday's 2-2 draw at home to Valencia left their hopes of overhauling La Liga leaders Barcelona hanging by a thread....
docs.lead_paragraph: Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti refused to throw in the towel after Saturday's 2-2 draw at home to Valencia left their hopes of overhauling La Liga leaders Barcelona hanging by a thread.

headline.main: German ships rescue more migrants in Mediterranean
headline.sub: German ships rescue more migrants in Mediterranean

docs.snippet: More than 400 migrants are plucked to safety from the waters of the Mediterranean by German ships including children and pregnant women. Mana Rabiee reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 400 migrants are plucked to safety from the waters of the Mediterranean by German ships including children and pregnant women. Mana Rabiee reports.

headline.main: Julio Iglesias Receives Honorary Degree From Berklee
headline.print_headline: Julio Iglesias Receives Honorary Degree From Berklee

docs.snippet: Julio Iglesias and three other prominent music industry figures have received honorary degrees from Boston's Berklee College of Music at its commencement....
docs.lead_paragraph: Julio Iglesias and three other prominent music industry figures have received honorary degrees from Boston's Berklee College of Music at its commencement.
